member.name: M:Dermalog.Imaging.Capturing.Device.GetCurrentFrameInfo(Dermalog.Imaging.Capturing.FrameInfoTypes)
member.summary: The function supplies an additional frame information within a or event and information relating to the current frame. Now there are two provided by this function LIFENESSINFO and LIFENESSINFO_1 the last structure returns liveliness score and liveliness state. The liveliness is defined in range -768 .. -799 an represent the current state of Dermalog Fakedetection compoment.

member.name: M:Dermalog.Imaging.Capturing.DeviceImpl.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code

members.member: The structure describes a VC3 pluggable module
A VC3 module unique ID
A path to the module allocated by VC3, must be freed by application
A module interface version.
An unit ID, unique in the module scope.
An unit category, finger print sensor, web-cam etc.
Event supported by this module, insert, remove etc.
Capture options supported by unit, single finger print, four print etc.
The structure describes a VC3 feature, module or unit
This is a type of condition e.g min, max values or enumeration
A size of elements in limiting_conditions array
A number of elements in limiting_conditions array
An array of conditions
* Allocated feature memory must free freed with Free *
* Allocated feature memory must free freed with Free *
This event type will be occurred if an asynchronous capturing will be stopped.
This event type will be occurred if a new image was captured.
This event type will be occurred if some of a object was detected, depending on an unit, e.g. finger, face.
This event type will be occurred if an error arises during capturing. The information about the error is kept in the payload.
